title: Thunderbird 'Sent' issue
content: Thunderbird IMAP Account Setting, Copies & Folders, When sending messages automatically... is set to 'Other' - "Sent on myacct@domain" per image, (or even if set to the normal "Sent Folder on: ") but when I reply or start new email the new message window has a dropdown with a default setting as inbox (per image). I have to manally select 'Sent' folder each time. What's going on ?
creator: MikeShegog1
